bibl.title: Letter from Mrs. Arthur S. Griswold to Philip Showalter Hench, July 24, 1950

div1.p: Mrs. Griswold sends Hench $50.00 for the Reed Memorial Association, in memory of Emilie Lawrence Reed.

div1.head: Letter from Mrs. Arthur S. Griswold to Philip Showalter Hench, July 24, 1950
div1.p:
ARMY MEDICAL CENTER
WASHINGTON 12, D. C.
MEDEC
July 24, 1950 Dr. Philip S. Hench,
Mayo Clinic,
Rochester, Minnesota.

I am enclosing you a check for $50.00 in memory of
Mrs. Walter Reed, toward the Walter Reed Foundation, which I under-
stand you are endeavoring to establish.

My interest and love of the Walter Reed General Hospital
where I am assigned as Hospital Visitor for the National Board of
Governors, prompts me to do this.

Very truly yours,
Mrs. Arthur S. Griswold
Dodge Hotel,
Washington, D. C.

5015 Pon Valley Road
Bloomfield Hills
Michigan

BESSIE M. GRISWOLD
5015 PON VALLEY ROAD

PAY
TO THE
ORDER OF Walter Reed Foundation $5000
Dr. Philip S. Hench
Fifty DOLLARS

THE RIGGS NATIONAL BANK
15-3/511 WASHINGTON, D. C.
